testcase.name: Reading Hotel Reservations
testcase.system-out: Given user connects to the database.........................................passed And user gets "Name" the "Hotel" table......................................passed And user reads all rows in the "Name" column................................passed And user gets the value in row 15 in "Name" column and verifies the value is "LILLE".passed And user gets the value in row 1 in "Name" column and verifies the value is "Rodisson Demo".passed And user gets the value in row 10 in "Name" column and verifies the value is "SUNSET".passed
